item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : 51098 - Correctly calculate image width/height, if image fits into one cell

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : 47147 - Correct extra paragraphs from XWPF Table Cells

item.title: add
item.description: add by poi-developers : 51188 - Support for getting and setting XPWF zoom settings

item.title: add
item.description: add by poi-developers : 51134 - Support for adding Numbering and Styles to a XWPF document that doesn't already have them

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : 51273 - Formula Value Cache fix for repeated evaluations

item.title: add
item.description: add by poi-developers : 51171 - Improved performance of SharedValueManager

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : 51236 - XSSF set colour support for black/white to match getter

item.title: add
item.description: add by poi-developers : 51196 - Initial support for Spreadsheet Chart API

item.title: add
item.description: add by poi-developers : Add support for OOXML Agile Encryption

item.title: add
item.description: add by poi-developers : 51160 - Initial version of SXSSF, a low memory foortprint API to produce xlsx files

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : 51171 - Improved performance of opening large .xls files

item.title: add
item.description: add by poi-developers : 51172 - Add XWPF support for GIF pictures

item.title: add
item.description: add by poi-developers : NPOIFS Mini Streams now support extending the underlying big block stream to fit more data

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : 51148 - XWPFDocument now properly tracks paragraphs and tables when adding/removing them

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : 51153 - Correct sizing of LbsDataSubRecord with unused padding fields

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : 51143 - NameCommentRecord correction for writing non ASCII strings

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : 51112 - Correct XWPFTable tracking of new rows

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : 51113 - Correct XWPFParagraph tracking of inserted runs

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : 51111 - Correct XWPFParagraph tracking of new runs

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : 51115 - Handle DataFormatter escaping of "." in the same way as "-" and "/"

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : 51100 - Fix IOUtils issue for NPOIFS reading from an InputStream where every block is full

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : 50956 - Correct XSSF cell style cloning between workbooks

item.title: add
item.description: add by poi-developers : Add get/setForceFormulaRecalculation for XSSF, and promote the methods to the common usermodel Sheet

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : Tweak the logic for sizing the HSSFCells array on a HSSFRow to reduce memory over allocation in many use cases

item.title: add
item.description: add by poi-developers : 49765 - Support for adding a picture to a XSSFRun

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : Rename/Move xssf.model.Table to xssf.usermodel.XSSFTable as it now has usermodel-like features

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : 51061 - Correct target URI for new XSSF Tables

item.title: add
item.description: add by poi-developers : Initial support for XSSF Charts. Provides easy access to the underlying CTChart object via the Sheet Drawing, but no high level interface onto the chart contents as yet.

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : 50884 - XSSF and HSSF freeze panes now behave the same

item.title: add
item.description: add by poi-developers : Support for adding a table to a XSSFSheet

item.title: add
item.description: add by poi-developers : Improve HSMF MAPIMessage access to the HTML and RTF versions of the message body (where available)

item.title: add
item.description: add by poi-developers : Add new method to HSMF of MAPIMessage.has7BitEncodingStrings() to make it easier to decide when encoding guessing is needed

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by poi-developers : OutlookTextExtractor now requests 7 bit encoding guessing

item.title: add
item.description: add by poi-developers : Improve HSMF encoding guessing for 7 bit fields in MAPIMessage

item.title: add
item.description: add by poi-developers : Allow HSMF access to the HTML body contents in MAPIMessage
